## AuthenticationStatus enum

Enumerated possible authentication statuses.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare enum AuthenticationStatus 
```

## Enumeration Members

|  Member | Value | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  Completed | <code>2</code> | Authentication is complete. |
|  Continue | <code>1</code> | Authentication is in progress. |
|  Error | <code>0</code> | Authentication failed. |
